title: FS: T206 O'Hara St Louis Polar Bear PSA 3 - SOLD
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: T206 O'Hara St Louis Polar Bear PSA 3 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains035/OHaraStLouisPSA3Front_zps08174155.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains035/OHaraStLouisPSA3Back_zps95efc968.jpg[/IMG]

This is a very nice example of one of the toughest of the 524. O'Hara St Louis. This example is a solid VG. Corners are VG/EX and there is a slight crease by his right shoulder.

Asking SOLD delivered.

Tom C
Thanks for the sale on the O'Hara.
